content: SP Universal diamond cup wheel (flat) Premium diamond cup wheel for angle grinders – for faster grinding of concrete, screed and natural stone ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster coating removal – these PCD cup wheels (polycrystalline diamond) are especially effective at removing thicker coatings Longer-lasting – steel body engineered to remove dust more effectively, helping to prevent clogged abrasive surfaces Advanced cooling – patented cooling pins work to prevent damage to the cup wheel segments due to overheating Robust – these cup wheels are built from the highest-grade materials using durable contact welding Minimized vibration – every cup wheel is individually checked and balanced before leaving the plant Applications Grinding concrete, screed and natural stone Removing thick coatings from concrete, screed or natural stone – such as epoxies and adhesives ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder Base material: Concrete, Screed, Natural stone Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Tool type | Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder | Base material | Concrete, Screed, Natural stone | Product Class | Premium | Arbor size | 5/8 in ### ITEMS- 2238559 - Diamond cup wheel DG-CW 4 SP univ - Package Size 1 pc - 2238560 - Diamond cup wheel DG-CW 4 1/2 SP univ - Package Size 1 pc - 2238561 - Diamond cup wheel DG-CW 5 SP univ - Package Size 1 pc - 2238562 - Diamond cup wheel DG-CW 7 SP univ - Package Size 1 pc
